Under Virginia law, #JohnnyDepp must prove by a preponderance of the evidence that #AmberHeard’s op-ed was false AND defamatory.
As a public figure, he must prove that she acted with “actual malice” - a high legal hurdle. 
This is why most celebrities do not sue for defamation.
